consultants.description: Harvey Savalla! Harvey Savalla is a seasoned marketing consultant with a proven track record of delivering exceptional results for businesses of all sizes. With over a decade of experience in the field, he possesses a deep understanding of marketing strategies, consumer behavior, and industry trends. Harvey is known for his innovative approach to marketing, and his ability to tailor strategies to meet the unique needs and goals of each client.
Meet Louis Langat. He's good at finance.
Meet Mike Rajula. He's a HR guru
